shipping_method_not_available_updated.many: It is not possible to ship to your location at least one of the items you have added. Please delete it(s) to be able to pay, or contact the store.

unsubscribe.title: You have unsubscribed
unsubscribe.description: You will no longer receive reminders about your shopping cart from us.

disclaimer.description_html: By signing up for SMS mailings, you agree to receive automated marketing messages at the phone number provided, including shopping cart reminders. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for help. The frequency of messages varies. Message and data charges may apply. See our %{privacy_policy_link} and our %{terms_of_service_link}.
disclaimer.description_transactional_html: We will send you the order receipt and regular shipping status updates via SMS. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for help. The frequency of messages varies. Message and data charges may apply. See our %{privacy_policy_modal_link} and our %{terms_of_service_modal_link}.

track.visibility: We'll see if you opened the email just in terms of its overall open rate.
